name: Orbits (itch) (Jamalamalamajam)
description:
Orbits allows you the player to simply sit back and relax while listening to some "A baru in new york" by Flume. The game puts you the player in control of the different camera effects within the game, allowing you to create your own unique visuals.

You simply toggle effects either on or off using the numbers from 0 to 9 on your keyboard and use the minus button (-) to delete all effects and start from the beginning once more.

Future plans are to make a custom controller to play with the game. LED arcade buttons will be used to tell you what effects you have on and off during the game. Then I also plan to hopefully show the game at different events. If you have any in mind please feel free to let me know. The game would be played in a very dark tent filled with lots of blankets and so on to get you nice and comfortable to play it. Secluding yourself from the outside world in this tent I feel will make it a much more enjoyable experience
